meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Amanda Wallwin J.D. Lopez Ellen Dickens Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6119.

td.p: Amanda Wallwin, a creative project manager from Brooklyn, New York
J.D. Lopez, a British literature lecturer and lacrosse coach originally from West Hartford, Connecticut
Ellen Dickens, an adult education director from Newcastle, Maine (whose 1-day cash winnings total $21,700)

tr.td: I'M A ROCK STAR
BIG DEAL
I SPEAK MANY TONGUES
WHO CARES?
THEY NAMED A MOUNTAIN FOR ME
JUST GET A MOVE ON

toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Amanda: Who is Keith Richards?)

Mick Jagger

J.D.Amanda
')

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
